title: Gust of Wind
tags: how to acquire gust of wind
content:
Gust of Wind Level 2 Evocation Spell Summon a strong wind that clears all clouds and pushes creatures back 5m, forcing them Off Balance. 1 Turn 12m STR Save Action Level 2 Spell Slot

Level 2 Evocation Spell

Summon a strong wind that clears all clouds and pushes creatures back 5m, forcing them Off Balance.

Gust of Wind is a Spell in Baldur's Gate 3. Gust of Wind is a Lvl 2 Spell from the Evocation school. Spells can be used for dealing damage to Enemies, inflict Status Ailments, buff Character
